      • login

        public java.lang.String login()
        Faces action method to log the user in and set the community id in this managed session bean. This version of the method emulates the older TAIR login with code taken from LoginChecker. The method may redirect to a different URL (the "original page") on successful login, and the method should do nothing after such a redirect.
        Returns:
        a blank to return to the login page or to the redirected URL

      • addAttributesToProxySession

        private java.util.UUID addAttributesToProxySession(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                         java.math.BigInteger loginId,
                                         java.lang.String personName,
                                         java.lang.String ip)
        Add the appropriate session attributes to the persistent proxy session. Put the proxy session id into the user's HTTP session for later use. If for some reason the method can't create a GUID session id, it throws a runtime exception.
        Parameters:
        session - the HTTP session that will contain the proxy session id
        loginId - the unique community identifier for the logged-in user
        personName - the full name of the logged-in user
        ip - the ip address of the user
        Returns:
        the id of the new proxy session

      • addCommunityAttributes

        private void addCommunityAttributes(org.tair.bs.community.SessionDelegate delegate,
                          java.math.BigInteger loginId,
                          org.tair.bs.community.BsSession session)
        Using the login id (the community id of the logged in user), get the Community object and its roles, then add the attributes to the proxy session that correspond to the user's roles.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the proxy session delegate
        loginId - the community id of the logged-in user
        session - the proxy session object to which to add attributes

      • subscribe

        public java.lang.String subscribe()
        Navigate to the register/subscribe page.
        Returns:
        "subscribe" to navigate to register/subscribe

      • resetPassword

        public java.lang.String resetPassword()
        Reset the password by notifying curator@arabidopsis.org.
        Returns:
        null string to redisplay page
